name: Filthy Animals | Halloween Heist
description:
Welcome to Filthy Animals | Halloween Heist

Become part of a gang of Mutant Animals who get involved in Ridiculous Heists at the behest of Bossman & Filthy Animal Rescuer, Tony.

Find your feet in the Sewer and pull off a daring Halloween Heist at the local Supermarket. Grab the cash, eat some tacos, set off some fireworks, have a blast!

A small taste of what you can expect from Filthy Animals | Heist Simulator. Join the gang in bigger, crazier, and more lucrative Heists in the Full Game coming 2022.

Features:
  • Physics-based puzzle/combat!
  • 1 - 4 players in Local and Online* co-op! (*via Steam Remote Play)
  • Active-Ragdoll Player Characters and NPCs!
  • The funkiest original soundtrack out there!


Note: Controllers required for Local Multiplayer & Remote Play - Controllers Recommended
